description: PM Mette Frederiksen says "we failed" the 22 Inuit children removed for a social experiment in 1951.
title: Denmark apologises to children taken from Greenland in a 1950s social experiment
title_page: Denmark apologises to children taken from Greenland in a 1950s social experiment - BBC News
maintext: Helene Thiesen, now 75 but seven at the time, said that her mother, who had been left alone with three children after their father's death, told her that Denmark was "just like paradise. You don't have to be sad".
